item.title: Version 1.8.0
item.description:
Changes

Hotfix was released to fix issues with the menu button and change the default grip binding.

  • Revive: Major overhaul of SteamVR Input support
    • Controller pose can now be customized in SteamVR as well
  • Revive: Updated OpenVR to version 1.6.10
  • Revive: Removed support for the Revive tab in the old versions of OpenVR-AdvancedSettings
  • Dashboard: Added Oculus Home to the list of default apps
  • ReviveXR: Update OpenXR support to 1.0 (experimental and untested)

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed stuttering in The Climb, The Unspoken and Wilson's Heart
  • Revive: Re-enabled pose submission to reduce latency in Defector and other apps
  • Revive: Small tweaks to display time prediction to improve tracking
